title: "Loc Performance and Milrem Robotics Collaborate on Bid for US Army's Robotic Combat Vehicle-Light (RCV-L) Program"
excerpt: "Loc Performance (\"Loc\"), a leading provider of military vehicle systems, and Milrem Robotics (\"Milrem\"), the leading European developer of robotics and autonomous systems, have joined together to create a world class offering for the United States Army's Robotic Combat Vehicle-Light (RCV-L) Prototype program."
